name: The Wizards Domain
overview: The evil wizard challenges you to enter his domain..and survive!!! Created in AMOS by Andy Paul. The evil wizard has taken the sweet princess and hidden her in the deepest level of his labyrinthine lair. You a modern day knight in shining armour, must drive your supercharged car through the levels collecting 4 transporter tablets on each level. When you have the 4 then you can land on the transporter to take you to the next level. Shoot the censors installed in the hallways, they block your way and also let the wizard know where you are.
